channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Leo Reveals His Secret
item.description: What a 17th-century monk can still teach us.

item.title: Report: Hegseth Gave Order to Kill Boat Operators Because They Were on a Target List
item.description: Is the Trump administration claiming the power to do what previous administrations have done: compile lists of ‘enemy combatants’ and kill them?

item.title: Rein In the Presidential Pardon Power
item.description: A bipartisan pattern of executive abuse shows why the unilateral power to pardon should be reconsidered.

item.title: Ben Rhodes Keeps Getting It Wildly Wrong on Israel and Gaza
item.description: Setting the record straight on the recent New York Times screed by Obama’s deputy national security adviser.

item.title: Why State Courts Should Not Set National Energy Policy
item.description: Judges are improperly turning courts into bastions of climate activism.

item.title: Media's take on economy irks Trump, Bessent says, as poll numbers sink and cost of living still high
item.description: President Trump isn't thrilled with the headlines about his economy.

item.title: As sea drones force Russia to retreat, Ukraine examines ways to launch more complex attacks
item.description: The commander of sea-drone operations for Ukraine's military intelligence agency says more complex strikes against Russian forces are expected next ye...

item.title: Republicans, Democrats square off over U.S. attacks on suspected drug boats in the Caribbean
item.description: President Trump's Republican allies in Congress pushed back Sunday on lawmakers from both parties who have raised concerns that a U.S. Navy commander'...

item.title: Hegseth: ‘The War Department Will Not Be Distracted By Regime Change’
item.description: Hegseth outlined four top objectives for the National Defense Strategy, saying the 'so-called bipartisan consensus...is really just a euphemism for di...

item.title: Omar doubts Minnesota fraud linked to terrorism, warns of harms of Trump calling Somalians 'garbage'
item.description: Rep. Ilhan Omar is not buying the idea -- embraced by some on the right -- that Minnesota's massive fraud case had ties to terrorism.

item.title: Records reviewed by AP detail online monitoring, arrests in New Orleans immigration crackdown
item.description: State and federal authorities are closely tracking online criticism and demonstrations against the immigration crackdown in New Orleans, monitoring me...

item.title: If America Can’t Get Immigration Right, Nothing Else Matters
item.description: If Somalis and Afghans and other unassimilable immigrants are allowed to remain here, they will metastasize into a national fifth column of hostile sa...

item.title: Confirming Covid Jabs Killed Kids Reinforces Gen Z’s Distrust Of Government
item.description: American teenagers have a fractured relationship with the federal government, one that may never be healed.

item.title: Normal Americans Are The Ones Who Pay The Price For Biden’s Disastrous Immigration Policies
item.description: 'This is a horrific situation, but one we’ve seen play out across Colorado and across the United States,' said Colorado DA George Brauchler.

item.title: Today In Republicans Being Useless: House GOPers Surrender On Obamacare Fight
item.description: By every measure, the GOP is more useless than that raccoon that broke into an ABC store, got drunk, and passed out on the bathroom floor.
